scripts.pkg:generate-codegen-bindings: npm run build ; npm run build:docs ; cd cli/gen-package ; ../../bin/elm-codegen install
scripts.pkg:test-install: node dist/index.js src/Generate.elm --output engine --cwd cli/gen-package --debug --flags-from playground/docs/gql-docs.json
scripts.pkg:install-elm-json: (npm run build; node dist/index.js install elm/json)
scripts.pkg:install-elm-core: (npm run build; node dist/index.js install elm/core)
scripts.pkg:install-local-file: (npm run build; cd cli/gen-package ; ../../bin/elm-codegen install test-package-from-file/Test.elm)
scripts.playground: (npm run build; cd playground; node ../dist/index.js run src/Gen.elm --debug)
scripts.playground-watch: (npm run build; cd playground; node ../dist/index.js run src/Gen.elm --debug --watch)
